xray.message.missing_input: You need to have all the inputs filled in
xray.message.already_exists: This block has already been added to the block list
xray.message.block_exists: %s already exists. Please enter a different name.
xray.message.unknown: Looks like the block you've tried to edit doesn't exist.
xray.message.config_missing: Config file not found. Creating now.
xray.message.thats_odd: Something went wrong? Sorry about that. Make an issue if this continues to happen
xray.message.nothing_infront: You're not looking at anything are you?
xray.message.not_a_number: {%s} is not a number. Please use a number for your meta
xray.message.meta_not_supported: {%s} isn't a valid meta data for {%s}
xray.message.state_warning:
Warning, this will limit you to default
blocks. Use looking at or in hand to get
the absolute block you require.
In some cases (chests) this may be what you need to do
if that's the case then this is the right option.
xray.tooltips.add_block:
Select a block to add to the XRay'd blocks
This uses block defaults, if you require a specific block
then use 'Add Looking At'.
xray.tooltips.add_block_in_hand:
Automatically selects the block you've
got in your hand to add to the list.
xray.tooltips.add_block_looking_at:
Automatically selects the block you're
looking at to add to the list.
xray.tooltips.show_lava:
Displays lava in RED like a normal block.
Watch out! It's hot.
xray.tooltips.distance: Warning: Lag if you go over 128.
xray.tooltips.edit2: Hold shift and click to edit.
xray.message.help.gui:
若要編輯方塊，只需按一下您要編輯的方塊。
如果你想要啟用或停用方塊，按一下方塊
 ，它就會開啟和關閉。
xray.message.help.warning: 作為警告， 使用任何超過 64 的視距將導致 FPS 下降， 因為我們必須掃描的大量方塊。 （就像 256^3）
